item.description:
Dance to the 18-piece Beantown Swing Orchestra, featuring vocalists Alex Hanon from NYC and 19-year-old Nadia Washington from Dallas.

Click here for more info.

The band plays from 8 to 11pm, and there will be a beginner swing dance lesson at 7:30pm. The lesson is a great opportunity for meetup members to meet each other (or at least the meetup members of the opposite sex) because the "followers" rotate through the "leaders" continuously. Meetup members get a special hand stamp at the door so you can identify each other during the lesson.
item.how_to_find_us: Frank will be on stage conducting the band.

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: Swing Dance in Concord, Mass.
